attributes.action: Make pornography use a protected characteristic.
attributes.additional_details: Pornography use is only harmful if illegal discriminatory attitudes prevail.
attributes.background:
The current exemptions indirectly include the use of pornography.

Specifically make pornography use a protected characteristic under the Equalities Act (2010).

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Pornography use is not a characteristic.
